item.title: Front Page
item.dc:creator: aspire
item.content:encoded:
para.chi.tokyo

Monday, May 13th, 2024 | Online via Zoom | In-person at Tokyo Tech

Local & Hybrid

In-person at Tokyo Tech (Ookayama Campus) in Tokyo, Japan and synchronous on Zoom

Learn More →

Live Virtual Papers

Online-only CHI '24 papers, unsubmitted papers, and journal papers published to HCI venues are presented live

Schedule →

Networking

Networking and mentorship for students, early career researchers, and HCI folks from all walks of life and career stages

Participate →

What is para.chi.tokyo?

Human-computer interaction (HCI) researchers around the world are holding events in parallel to CHI '24 (May 11-16th, 2024), an initiative called para.chi. Dr. Katie Seaborn @ Tokyo Tech is hosting para.chi.tokyo with Dr. Giulia Barbareschi @ Keio University. (And maybe you?)

Motivations run the gamut: the #whychi movement; the crises in Hawai'i, where CHI '24 is taking place; desires for more sustainable and accessible conferencing; concerns about global pandemics and geopolitical events; the decision to remove synchronous participation for virtual authors at CHI '24, which disproportionately affects students, early career researchers, and all those unable or unwilling to join in-person.

Through para.chi.tokyo, we offer a parallel event to CHI '24 that (i) provides a live session for accepted virtual papers and unsubmitted papers and HCI journal papers; (ii) enables networking opportunities; and (iii) connects students and early career researchers with a diversity of HCI folk locally and online.

Participate →
Help host →
Schedule →

Tentative Schedule

Morning・午前（JST）

  • 00:00: Opening
  • 00:00: Virtual Papers 1
  • 00:00: Break
  • 00:00: Matching Game
  • 00:00: Lunch Break (BYOB)

Afternoon・午後（JST)

  • 00:00: Virtual Papers 2
  • 00:00: Break
  • 00:00: Networking
  • 00:00: Closing (BYOB)

Please note that the schedule is tentative: We're planning a half-day or full-day event, depending on how many people participate.

Sign up →
Help host →

Co-organize with us

We're looking for HCI researchers and professors in the Tokyo-Japan-Asia region who are interested in virtual or in-person co-hosting.

Get in touch with Katie Seaborn:

para.chi.events@gmail.com

Present your paper live

Do you have a virtual paper accepted at CHI '24? Perhaps you chose not to submit to CHI '24 this year, but have a paper ready? Maybe you have a HCI journal paper just accepted or published and are looking for a live venue. Present your work and get feedback from a live audience in the Tokyo-Japan-Asia region!

Deadline: March 31st, 2024

For your initial submission, please provide:

  • the authors, title, and abstract of your paper
  • evidence of its acceptance for publication,
  • who will present,
  • where (online or face-to-face), and
  • any accessibility requirements

para.chi.events@gmail.com

Participate as an
audience member

Students, researchers at all career stages, industry professionals, hobbyists, and professorsーjoin us online or in Tokyo, Japan at Tokyo Tech Ookayama Campus to support virtual presenters and those who did not submit this year, as well as network with a diversity of HCI folks.

Deadline: March 31st, 2024

Please provide:

  • your name, title, and position
  • your career stage
  • whether you will join online or face-to-face
  • any accessibility requirements

para.chi.events@gmail.com
